name: Drillin' Around
description:
A puzzle platformer in which the world falls apart as you loop around it, drill as many resources as you can before the level becomes too unstable to survive.

Made in 2 days for Global Game Jam 2015 with the theme: What do we do now? We wanted to look at making a single button game and create all our maps from simple images.

Controls:
Space: Jump (hold to go further)
